item.description:
From http://www.harvard.com/event/our_summer_warehouse_sale2/:

Long, sunny days are fast approaching, and so is our hotly anticipated Summer Warehouse Sale. Come stock up and get going on that summer reading list!

Harvard Book Store WarehouseHarvard Book Store welcomes you once again to our Somerville Warehouse on Saturday, June 23, and Sunday, June 24.

Selections will include a new crop of freshly marked down $1, $2, and $3 used books. All other used books will be 60% off their original cover price, while bargain books will be an additional 15% off their already low prices. We will also have a special section of the rare and collectible.

Please note that gift cards and Frequent Buyer discounts cannot be redeemed at the Warehouse Sale. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Our Warehouse is located on Park St. in Somerville, between Somerville Ave. and Beacon St. The closest T stop is Porter Square, on the Red Line, and bus lines #83 and #87 have stops on Somerville Ave. near Park St.
item.name: Harvard Book Store Warehouse Sale
